entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:02 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 3:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
